summary: A crossbow that doesn\'t require reloading
descriptionHtml:
[color=cyan][b]don\'t count on getting a quick shot bugfix, if anyone even cares anymore.[/b][/color]


This mod adds a new standalone crossbow that does not need reloading. It will not shoot as fast as your trigger finger, however.

A video, for those who claim that this is bullshit:
[youtube]a7Q2G1B6A04[/youtube]

I also happen  to have made a new model for it! ^_^
My mod seems to not be working for people with the \"quick draw\" perk in the archery skill tree, I\'m currently looking into fixing that.

[b]
it\'s crafted EXCLUSIVELY at the forge within fort dawnguard, and it\'s called \"Machine Crossbow\"[/b]
To access the recipe:
Sorine Jurard has a hastily scribbled note, it\'s pretty much impossible to pickpocket.
Once you acquire the note, read it.
Once the note has been read, you can craft the item at the forge within fort dawnguard.
Make sure you have the note in your inventory or you will no longer be able to craft the item.
If you lose the note, don\'t worry, it respawns.

(please oh please let me be the first person that did this)
author: Bzhuan
